body: Yeah I agree it reminds me of one of his earlier works where the end result was the blond was only doing the corruption thing to make the guy hate him enough that the blessing hiding his true form which was a female goddess would be removed and he could forcefully marry her! This one ends in a more positive note because it becomes consensual while in the other he just uses that power of His to make the guy now girl fall in love with him in a love-hate relationship where she hates him for ruining her family and her childhood friend but can't resist mating with him. Stockholm with a hint of Lima. Loved how he was never in love with his tomboy friend so there was no NTR here. Especially when said a friend even corrupted still want to have sex with him simply out of a sense of entitlement to his virginity before the bombshell that he was never interested sexually in her no matter her body type or disposition dropped. I mean at least they're still good friends without the awkwardness now!
For what it's worth... it surprisingly ends on a positive note.
